channel.title: Python on Hello w3nch
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Hello w3nch

item.title: Space Age
item.description: Introduction The year is 2525 and you’ve just embarked on a journey to visit all planets in the Solar System (Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune). The first stop is Mercury, where customs require you to fill out a form (bureaucracy is apparently not Earth-specific). As you hand over the form to the customs officer, they scrutinize it and frown. “Do you really expect me to believe you’re just 50 years old?
